short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use MakeCents to easily navigate through the financial world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever struggle with reading a financial article due to not being familiar with the language? MakeCents makes reading complex articles, make sense! By highlighting financial terms as you browse the web, MakeCents creates a more seamless process of learning the in's and out's of the financial world.
